name: Fantasma Hotel
description:
Feel the quiet horror as you wander through the corridors where maniacs and madmen are waiting for you. Travel through a hellish hotel in roguelike style with turn-based battles and ruthless choices. Experiment in choosing the passage of various events to discover new forms of atmospheric horror in each passage.
